requirements.description: Each Party must adhere to their obligations concerning End User data as outlined in this Contract and relevant privacy laws.
Each Party is required to have a privacy policy that is compliant with applicable privacy laws and is prominently displayed.

The privacy policy must include a clear description of the data sets collected or allowed to be collected, and the use cases related to personal data, including mentioning that such data will be shared with certain third parties for specific use cases.

Privacy laws such as CCPA, CPRA, and other relevant US state privacy laws may require providing sufficient notice about End Users' rights to their personal information and mechanisms for opting out of data usage.
The privacy policy should also disclose the use of third parties and cookies for attribution purposes and/or serving targeted advertisements.

type.summary: Disclosure of Third-Party Use and Cookie Usage
